title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Online Transversal Skills Development for Doctoral Researchers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% of their research competency goals by applying self-directed time management strategies in online learning environments
Learners can present practical solutions to research problems by utilizing collaboration and communication skills through project-based assessments
Learners can demonstrate proficiency in using digital tools in blended learning environments and apply them to research documentation at over 90% efficiency
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
